nodes.documentation:
The `RandomAccessStorage` contract is an interface for volatile
memory access.
nodes.name: RandomAccessStorage

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to ensure a given bytes pointer is of "valid"
length (len > 0)
nodes.name: valid

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to ensure a given bytes pointer is of
"valid" length (len > 0) and a memory cell at a
given offset is also of "valid" length.
nodes.name: access

nodes.documentation: Helper function to return length of bytes
nodes.name: length

nodes.documentation: Reads a memory cell at a given `offset` for a `pointer`.
nodes.name: read

nodes.documentation: Writes a buffer to a memory cell at a given `offset` for a `pointer`.
nodes.name: write
